description.@en: By all that is divine, the Inquisitor metes out justice upon those who offend the gods. You are therefore protected against corruption, in its many forms. You can sniff out all forms of chaos, Ætheric or otherwise.

effect.@en: You are always under the effects of the Generalist Magick called Wytchsight. However, you retain your normal vision, able to ‘turn off ’ this sight on command.
